name: Basic Driving Game
description: This is really just a test game for me to try out unity for the first time and see how everything works, its an incredibly simple game where you use the arrow keys to avoid the gray cars and hit jumps and such (The jumps are basically death traps since you can't control the car in air), press the forward arrow to drive faster (not recommended) and the back arrow to slow down again, and that's basically it!
